definition: to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: Their variations in increase and decrease are closely related to the monsoons of South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 这些变性水团的消长变化与南海的季风密切相关。

sentences.english: The population dynamics of Pardosa T-insignita in cotton fields were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了丁纹豹蛛种群消长动态。

sentences.english: Increasing and decreasing of stored starch are closely related to the periodicity of cambial activity.
sentences.chinese: 淀粉储量的消长与形成层活动周期有很强的相关关系。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the population composition and seasonal fluctuation of fleas parasitized on Rattus tanezumi in Leizhou city.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解雷州市黄胸鼠鼠体蚤的种群构成及消长。

definition: to flourish then decline/rise and fall
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
to flourish and decay/rise and fall
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
coming together and separating/aggregation and dissipation
